# What is Spike?

Spike is a very simple moderation bot, it has been created to help with the moderation of discord servers.\
It has lots of useful commands that are not only related to the moderation of the server, and also it can be customized to best suit the server's needs.

## 🚀 Getting Started

You can simply add the bot to your server using [this link](https://cutt.ly/netbot-spike), here you can find the [support server](https://discord.com/invite/WVr852CRpW).

> The default prefix is 's!'

To get started use the command `s!prefix [custom prefix]` to set the bot's prefix to any combination of three letters.

To change the server's settings you can use `s!setup`.

For any kind of issue or suggestion please contact me trough the support discord server.

## 📝 Features & Commands

* 🔨 Banning a member from the server (You can use similar commands also for kicks and warns)

`s!ban @Clyde spamming in #general`

* 🔇 Muting a member for a determined amount of time

`s!mute @Clyde 3d12h flooding`

* 📊 Getting informations about a user

`s!userinfo @Clyde`

* 📈 Getting informations about the server, including a fancy graph

`s!serverinfo`\
\
![serverinfo command](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/787230004891090984/841402388458766353/Screenshot_2021-05-10_at_21.52.36.png)
\
\
\
Help message content:

* Mute **|** Mutes a member for a determined amount of time
* UnMute **|** UnMutes a member of the server
* Kick **|** Kicks a member from the server
* Ban **|** Bans a member from the server
* UnBan **|** UnBans a user from the server.
* Warn **|** Adds a warn to a member of the server
* UnWarn **|** Removes a warn from a member of the server
* Userinfo **|** Gives informations about the specified user
* Setup **|** Change server's settings
* Help **|** This command
* Ping **|** Returns the current ping of the bot
* Info **|** Returns some information about the bot
* Link **|** Returns every link related to the bot.
* Prefix **|** Allows the change the custom server's prefix
* ServerInfo **|** Returns lots of information about the guild
